name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. Theodore WRIGHT a/k/a Curtis Price, Petitioner v. Tammy FERGUSON as Facility Manager SCI Benner; and the District Attorney of Philadelphia Co., Pa. and Kathleen Kane, Esq., Attorney General of Pennsylvania

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. Theodore WRIGHT a/k/a Curtis Price, Petitioner v. Tammy FERGUSON as Facility Manager SCI Benner; and the District Attorney of Philadelphia Co., Pa. and Kathleen Kane, Esq., Attorney General of Pennsylvania.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 29th day of May, 2015, the Application for Leave to File Original Process is GRANTED, and the Petition for Writ of Habeas Corpus is DENIED.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
115 A.3d 311
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania ex rel. Theodore WRIGHT a/k/a Curtis Price, Petitioner v. Tammy FERGUSON as Facility Manager SCI Benner; and the District Attorney of Philadelphia Co., Pa. and Kathleen Kane, Esq., Attorney General of Pennsylvania.
No. 36 EM 2015.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
May 29, 2015.
